name: KLIP AI
description: KlipAi is the smart wallet layer for Web3 that brings clarity to crypto transactions. It turns every transaction into clean, AI-powered receipts and lets users send tokens using simple usernames—no more wallet address mistakes or confusing hashes. KlipAi makes crypto easier to track, understand, and manage for individuals, traders, and businesses. Money should be simple. KlipAi makes it that way. Whether you're a trader tracking positions, a business paying a distributed team, or a creator earning on-chain, KlipAi gives you financial clarity—without leaving Web3.
